#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define trace(x) cerr << #x << ": " << x << " ";
#define tracen(x) cerr << #x << ": " << x << "\n";

typedef long long lolo;
typedef unsigned long long ulolo;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;
#define fi first
#define se second

const int INF = 1e9 + 23;
const lolo MOD = 'Z' - 'A' + 1;
const int MAXN = 100;

lolo fib[MAXN];
char arr[MAXN];

void pre() {
  fib[0] = fib[1] = 1;
  arr[0] = arr[1] = 'A';
  for (int i = 2; i < MAXN; ++i) {
    fib[i] = fib[i - 1] + fib[i - 2];
    arr[i] = 'A' + ((fib[i] - 1) % MOD);
  }
}

int main()
{
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
  pre();
  int t, n;
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    cin >> n;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
      cout << arr[i];
    }
    cout << "\n";
  }
  return 0;
}

// g++ -W -Wkk -Wextra -pedantic -std=c++11 -o p main.cpp
